name: Legends of the Black Samurai The Fruit Slayer Pro
name_original: Legends of the Black Samurai The Fruit Slayer Pro
description:
Focus is everything in life!!!


If you aren't focused you won't be able to do anything in life.

This is the very lesson that has been taught to samurais again and again by their mantors .

You are lucky to have got the chance to build and increase your level and focus by playing this simple but very addictive game that will turn you into an actual Samurai.

The game has a simple concept fruits will be thrown in the air randomly you need to slice them all as fast as you can if you miss you loose.

The game seems to be very easy but it requires your utmost focus.

Slay those fruits !!!
